ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors are grateful to Dr. Tomoko Nakamura and Dr. Akira Iwase for providing the HGrC1 cell line. Also, they would like to thank Dr. Louise Bilezikjian for FOXL2 wt expression plasmid, Dr. Kohei Miyazono for providing us with the original hSMAD3 cDNA clones, Dr. Kristen Jepsen for the RNA-seq platform assistance and the generation of the library, Dr. Cloos for sharing BAM files of the ChIP-seq data from Weis-Banke et al ., 2020.
